word: H7287 - רָדָה - râdâh - raw-daw' - Have dominion - ஆளுகைசெய்

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஆளு, ஆண்டுகொள், ஆளுகை செய், கண்காணி, பற்றியெறி, எடு
1) to rule, to have dominion, to dominate, to tread down
a) (Qal) to have dominion, to rule, to subjugate

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to tread down, that is, subjugate; specifically to crumble off: - (come to, make to) have dominion, prevail against, reign, (bear, make to) rule, (-r, over), take.
